<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Emberkin](/Feats.aspx?ID=2283) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 9 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

A [peri's](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1262) roaring spirit burns in your soul. Peris engage in constant struggle to right the wrongs of their fallen forebears, and that struggle has been passed on to you. You have a direct impulse to right wrongs and better the world. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) effects, and your perception is unaffected by non-magical flames, fog and smoke.

<title level="2">Emberkin leads to...</title>
[Flame Jump](/Feats.aspx?ID=2294), [Peri Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2292)
name: Emberkin
